titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Mary le Bow before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen, on Wednesday the 16th of July being the fast day by Samuel Barton.
titleStmt.author: Barton, Samuel, 1647 or 8-1715.

notesStmt.note: Half title: Mr. Barton's fast-sermon before the Lord Mayor, and Court of Aldermen, July 16, 1690.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
